events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me well. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for returning a product and receiving money back.
A customer service representative was assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I am here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is #452987 and I want to return the jacket because it is too small for me.
Thank you for the details. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. I will ship it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and the refund has been processed. You should see the amount back on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
